place.name: DISGOED
place.gazetteerText: DISCOED, or Discoyd, a township in Presteigne parish, Radnor; on Offa's Dyke and the river Lug, 2½ miles W of Presteigne. Acres, 866. Real property, £1, 828. Pop., 111. Houses, 21. It forms a curacy with Presteigne. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
